item.title: CVE-2023-52191|2024-08-02T22:55:40.866Z -- torbjon -- infogram%20%E2%80%93%20add%20charts%2C%20maps%20and%20infographics
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Torbjon Infogram – Add charts, maps and infographics allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Infogram – Add charts, maps and infographics: from n/a through 1.6.1.
